title: Humor the Baby
body:
Your champion is a special guest at a couple's house. Your champion is there to meet the baby in its crib. How does your champion make the baby laugh?

Example:
{{champion:42}} 
Simply fly his helicopter or red baron airplane around the crib like those spinning toys that the baby likes to watch above it.

replies.body:
{{champion:113}}  Riding a giant fluff monster chasing a cinnamon roll. If that doesn't amuse a baby, she's got nothing for you.

{{champion:31}} *burp* What baby?
{{champion:432}} So I heard you like chimes?
{{champion:56}} Oh you said laugh? I thought you meant scar for life, because that's all I'm gonna do.

> [{quoted}](name=macromite,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=E34ZJUUH,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2015-06-20T23:27:41.183+0000)
>
> {{champion:56}} Oh you said laugh? I thought you meant scar for life, because that's all I'm gonna do.

Unless it's a dark child. Darker than {{champion:1}}
{{champion:63}} OMG I DIDNT MEAN TO IM SO SORRY

{{champion:74}} desing a ultra mega toy!!!
{{champion:81}} lights everywhere
{{champion:107}} who dont like the cats????

{{champion:89}} Makes her shield glow faintly
{{champion:16}} Makes it rain bananas around the crib

{{champion:83}} summons a tiny ghoul for the baby to play with.
{{champion:201}} lets the baby rub his mustache.
{{champion:14}} Uh. Lets skip sion...
